turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi! I need to place an order for some coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Black and White Mocha coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And where would you like it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it from Starbucks on Oakton & Lee St. in Des Plaines, IL.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what would you like in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want some cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size are looking for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the largest size that they have.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many of them would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like two of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And are both of them the same?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, they are both the same.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will that complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I am placing your order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please let me know when it is confirmed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order has gone through and it should be ready for pickup very shortly! You will receive a receipt via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day!
